roleset.name: reconfigure something's wiring
roleset.note: REWIRE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from rewire.01-v)

role.descr: end state, secondary predication on arg1

example.name: ergative
example.text: How long are we supposed to wait to see if this woman s brain will ever rewire effectively before we move on ?

example.name: All args
example.text: You can also use your instinctive reward system *PRO* to rewire the brain to want to chase a new craving.
example.arg: to want to chase a new craving
